title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic. Saut√© until the onion is translucent and fragrant.
Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they are golden brown and tender.
Reduce the heat to low and pour in the heavy cream. Stir well to combine.
Add the grated Parmesan cheese and dried thyme. Stir until the sauce thickens slightly.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat the pasta with the creamy mushroom sauce.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes to heat the pasta through.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.
